Detailed Description

Energy Input Exhaust Gas Losses Used to calculate the fuel heat that is delivered to the oven/furnace

Definition at line 18 of file EnergyInputExhaustGasLosses.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ EnergyInputExhaustGasLosses() [1/3]

EnergyInputExhaustGasLosses::EnergyInputExhaustGasLosses ( const double  excessAir,
const double  combustionAirTemp,
const double  exhaustGasTemp,
const double  totalHeatInput = 1 
)
inline

Constructor for the energy input - exhaust gas losses - Will calculate availableHeat given input parameters and calculate heatDelivered and exhaustGasLosses

Parameters
excessAirdouble, excess air as %
combustionAirTempdouble, temperature of combustion air in °F
exhaustGasTempdouble, temperature of exhaust gas in °F
totalHeatInputoptional double, total heat input from all sources of heat supplied in Btu/hr, if this is zero, available heat will be 100%
